pr_title: [homekit] Implements support for HomeKit with Lock mechanisms.

timeline.message:
Implements support for HomeKit with Lock mechanisms.

Signed-off-by: Benjamin Lafois <benjamin@lafois.com>

Updated README.md documentation according to the added support for Lock.

Signed-off-by: Benjamin Lafois <benjamin@lafois.com>

timeline.bodyText: Please have a look at the other @JavaDoc and adjust accordingly
timeline.author: J-N-K

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/bundles/org.openhab.io.homekit/src/main/java/org/openhab/io/homekit/internal/accessories/HomekitLockImpl.java b/bundles/org.openhab.io.homekit/src/main/java/org/openhab/io/homekit/internal/accessories/HomekitLockImpl.java
index ef74daf923..36bfe5f042 100644
--- a/bundles/org.openhab.io.homekit/src/main/java/org/openhab/io/homekit/internal/accessories/HomekitLockImpl.java
+++ b/bundles/org.openhab.io.homekit/src/main/java/org/openhab/io/homekit/internal/accessories/HomekitLockImpl.java

@@ -25,8 +25,9 @@ import io.github.hapjava.accessories.LockableLockMechanism;
 import io.github.hapjava.accessories.properties.LockMechanismState;
 
 /**
+ * Implements the support of Lock accessories, mapping them to OpenHAB Switch type 
  *
- * @author blafois
+ * @author blafois - Support for additional accessory type.
  *
  */
 public class HomekitLockImpl extends AbstractHomekitAccessoryImpl<SwitchItem> implements LockableLockMechanism {
